source_documents_processed: Use Case Diagram - Online Shopping System

functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow new customers to register as clients in the online shopping system
acceptance_criteria: New customer can access client registration functionality
Registration process creates a user account in the system

functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow both registered customers and new customers to view items available for purchase
acceptance_criteria: Web customers can browse available items
Registered customers can view product catalog
New customers can access item viewing functionality

functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow registered customers to make purchases of items
acceptance_criteria: Registered customers can initiate purchase process
Purchase functionality is available within the online shopping subsystem

functional_requirements.description: The system shall provide checkout functionality that includes the make purchase process
acceptance_criteria: Customers can complete transaction through checkout

non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall integrate with an external authentication service to verify user credentials
acceptance_criteria: System connects to external authentication service
User authentication is handled by dedicated service

non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall integrate with an external identity provider for user identity management
acceptance_criteria: System connects to identity provider service
User identities are managed through external provider

non_functional_requirements.source_reference: Use Case Diagram - Credit Payment Service
non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall integrate with an external credit payment service to process credit card transactions
acceptance_criteria: System connects to credit payment service
Credit card payments are processed through external service

non_functional_requirements.description: The system shall integrate with PayPal service to provide alternative payment processing capabilities
acceptance_criteria: PayPal payments are supported as payment option
